about_the_game:
Ninety Nine waves. You'll need to balance your strategic and economic skills in order to defend your core against the digital attackers.

Collect bits to build towers and reroll your shop in search of those important upgrades, you'll need them.

Keep an eye on the invaders, they will throw a variety of unit types your way to bypass your defenses.

Watch out for Blackouts. Reserve power will have your towers functioning, but visibility may be impaired until main power is restored.

Customize your deck as you progress, with upgrades you find along the way. Be wary of hazardous software.

-- Please note that the AEGIS corporation has a zero tolerance policy on failure. Anything but success will result in your termination and immediate replacement. Our clients deserve the best. --

name: Defend 99

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: i5-8500, Ryzen 2220g
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750Ti, Radeon R7 265, 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: DEFEND 99 is a rogue-lite tower defense game with deckbuilding and autochess elements. Place your turrets, roll for upgrades and balance your economy in the hope of defending your network of the elite from an array of digital attackers. Can you hold off all ninety nine waves?
